Script for Susan

Dialog 1 – dFirst

Player: How is work going?
[SUSA1] Susan: You don't work today. Why are you here?

Player: What are you drinking?
[SUSA2] Susan: It's water.

Player: Nice car out front.
[SUSA3] Susan: Thanks! I got it at Mercury Motors.

Player: Good bye.
[SUSA4] Susan: See you later.

Dialog 2 – dSecond

Debra: Hi Susan!
[SUSA5] Susan: Mm.

Player: How is work going?
[SUSA6] Susan: Isn't today your day off?

Player: Can I have a piece of paper?
[SUSA7] Susan: Sure, I have plenty.
Narrator: You get a piece of paper.

Player: Nice car out front.
[SUSA3] Susan: Thanks! I got it at Mercury Motors.

Player: Good bye.
[SUSA8] Susan: Sure.

Global script GlobalScript

Debra: That's Susan the receptionist.
[SUSA9] Susan: Who are you talking to?

Room 5 – radio lobby

[SUSA10] Susan: False alarm.
[SUSA11] Susan: Awwwwwk... Ugh...
[SUSA12] Susan: Cornnuts.

[SUSA13] Susan: MY CAR!
[SUSA14] Susan: I'll be right back.

[SUSA15] Susan: Hey Debra! You can't go in there.
Debra: I don't need to go in there.
